Text: #G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to learn about all the social activities that are organized in my neighborhood.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to play online games together with other users.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have some games that show me how good my memory and physical health is.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to organize a meeting with a group of friends at a certain place.
#G19# As a developer, I want to enable customers to provide feedback about my App and need an easy way to watch this feedback.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to help me navigate despite my mild cognitive impairments.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to enable me to have face to face contacts as well, so that I do not just have virtual contacts over ALFRED.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to be sure that the user can decide who has access to her data.
#G19# As a developer, I want to have an easy way to manage the pricing modality of my Apps.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to be able to determine the user's breathing frequency.
#G19# As a developer, I want to be notified as soon as possible when the state of any of my Apps changes.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to decide who has access to my vital data.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to control if the user does the exercise correct.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that helps me to communicate with my friends and family.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have videophone.
#G19# As a SocialCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to be able to recognize pain and or stress by using skin conduction sensors.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to use video calls in case of emergency.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to get a personalized invitation to a social event, so that it motivates more to go.
#G19# As an InformalCaregiver, I want to have a game that the carer could play together with the user, so that it would enable to monitor the users’ state of health but also have some fun time.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED ask spontaneous questions but it would be better to programme it during certain times of the day.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive support to use the public transport.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to control the heating.
